mapper.insert: insert into rwd_discuss_reply (re_num, dis_num, reply, replyer) values (seq_discuss_reply.nextval, #{dis_num}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select * from rwd_discuss_reply where dis_num = #{num} and re_num > 0 order by re_num
mapper.update: update rwd_discuss_reply set reply = #{reply}, update_date = sysdate where re_num = #{re_num}
